title: How to Make a Square Sheet of Paper

steps.title: Take a single sheet of paper.
steps.content: Take a single sheet of paper. This can be of any size, standard size however is 8 by 11 . You may only do this for one sheet of paper at a time. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Hold the top right corner of the paper and fold it towards the lower left side.
steps.content: Hold the top right corner of the paper and fold it towards the lower left side. Bring it down until the paper forms into a right-angled triangle. [2] X Research source Make sure all the corners touch each other exactly. There should be a small rectangular section left at the bottom.

steps.title: Cut this section off using paper scissors.
steps.content: Cut this section off using paper scissors. [3] X Research source
